title: ï»¿ The Store is currently unavailable, we will be back shortly.
body: I'm getting this error on one of my accounts when I try to visit the store. I've tried logging in on my lower leveled account and it works fine. I've tried repairing client as well as deleting the 'lol air client' and it is still not working. Anyone know how I can fix this?

replies.body: This is an issue that many people are facing and Riot are trying to fix it on the NA servers.
having the same problem, haven't been able to access the store for a few days now...
